properties.name: workspaceId
properties.description: The ID of the workspace. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the channel

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the channel

properties.name: public
properties.description: Whether the channel will be marked as public

properties.name: temp_id
properties.description: The temporary ID of the channel. It needs to be a negative number.

properties.name: user_ids
properties.description: The users that will participate in the channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: The ID of the channel

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Whether only archived conversations are returned

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Archive a channel

properties.name: Create
properties.description: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a channel

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get information about a channel

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many channels

properties.name: Unarchive
properties.description: Unarchive a channel

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a channel

properties.name: conversationId
properties.description: The ID of the conversation. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content of the new message. Mentions can be used as [Name](twist-mention://user_id) for users or [Group name](twist-group-mention://group_id) for groups.

properties.name: button_text
properties.description: The text for the action button

properties.name: message
properties.description: The text for the action button

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the button. (Currently only action is available).

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to redirect

properties.name: binaryProperties
properties.description: Name of the property that holds the binary data. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.

properties.name: direct_mentions
properties.description: The users that are directly mentioned. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: order_by
properties.description: The order of the conversations returned - one of DESC or ASC

properties.name: from_obj_index
properties.description: Limit messages starting at the specified object index

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the conversation message

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the new thread (1 < length < 300)

properties.name: recipients
properties.description: The users that will attached to the thread. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: send_as_integration
properties.description: Whether to display the integration as the thread creator

properties.name: threadId
properties.description: The ID of the thread

properties.name: newer_than_ts
properties.description: Limits threads to those newer when the specified Unix time

properties.name: older_than_ts
properties.description: Limits threads to those older than the specified Unix time

properties.name: mark_thread_position
properties.description: Whether the position of the thread is marked

properties.name: commentId
properties.description: The ID of the comment

properties.name: to_obj_index
properties.description: Limit comments ending at the specified object index
